The life of Titus Oates from his cradle to his first pilloring for infamous perjury with a true account of his birth and parentage; impartially set forth for the satisfaction of all persons.
4 p.
Printed by E. Mallet ..., by the heir of Andrew Anderson ..., [London : 1685 ; Re-printed at Edinburgh, : Anno Dom. 1685]
Caption title. "Enter'd according to order." Imprint from colophon. Imperfect: print show-through with some loss of text. Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
